author: Connie Loizos
title: Longtime VC Neil Sequeira: funding founders without in-person meetings is ‘quite difficult’
description: "If you want to be in this industry, because it's a relationship-driven but also a reputation-based business, these aren't the moments to take advantage of people."
content:
Neil Sequeira was a managing director with General Catalyst for more than 13 years before co-founding early-stage firm Defy several years ago with another veteran of the industry, Trae Vassallo, who’d spent the dozen years prior with Kleiner Perkins.
We caug… [+788 chars]
